import React from "react"; import data from "../data"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../App.css"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; return (
{loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (
Back to Order Page

  • {product.name}

  • {product.type}
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description: {product.description}
  • Price: {product.price}
  • Flavour:{" "}
  • Spice Level:{" "}
  • First Side:{""}
  • Second Side:{" "}
)}
); } export default ProductScreen;
